content: Who wrote the classic novel "Pride and Prejudice"?

"Pride and Prejudice" is a classic novel written by Jane Austen. It was first published in 1813 and is considered one of her most famous works. The novel revolves around the lives of the Bennet sisters and their search for love and suitable marriages in the British landed gentry of the late 18th century. Austen's sharp wit and insightful commentary on society make this book a timeless masterpiece.
